full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAS PA'I BSTAN BCOS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI LE'U BZHI PA'I MTHA' DPYOD MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO RJE RTA NAG PA DGE 'DUN BLO BZANG GI GSUNG RGYUN DRI MA MED PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @180B ZHES RGYAS PA'I BSTAN BCOS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI LE'U BZHI KA'I MTHA' DPYOD LUNG DANG RIGS PA'I BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO DGE 'DUN BLO BZANG GIS GTZAD BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I SA'I BYANG 'DABS, RNAM MANG THOS BSAM GLING GI CHOS GRVA CHEN POR SBYAR BA'O, ,@181A *, ,AOm SVA STI, RIGS PA'I DBANG PHYUG PHYOGS GLANG CHOS KYI GRAGS, ,RIGS GSUM 'DUS SKU 'JAM MGON TZONG KHA PA, ,RIGS LUNG MTHAR SON DGE 'DUN BLO BZANG ZHABS, ,RIGS LAM GSAL MDZAD BLA MA RNAMS LA 'DUD, ,SDE BDUN MDO DANG BCAS PA'I RGYA MTSO'I JING, ,BDE BLAG BRGAL BA'I RMAD BYUNG GRU BO CHE, ,DRI MED LUNG RIGS DAR 'PHYAR GYIS BRGYAN PA, ,'DI NI 'DZAD MED DPAR GYI 'PHRUL DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE 'DIS RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DU, ,ZHVA SER RING LUGS DRI MED RAB RGYAS SHING, ,BSTAN 'DZIN SPYI DANG BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN 'GRO MGON, ,ZHABS PAD SRID MTHA'I BAR DU BRTAN 'GYUR CIG ,TSAD GZHUNG RIGS LAM NYIN BYED TSA ZER GYIS, ,BKA' BOD RNAM LNGAR KUN MONGS LTA NGAN BSREG ,RTEN 'BYUNG BSLU MED GTAN TSIGS GRU CHAR GYIS, ,MTHA' BRAL GNAS LUGS RTOGS PA'I 'BRAS SMIN SHOG ,TSUL 'DIR 'BREL THOGS GTZO BYAS LUS CAN KUN, ,MTSAN LDAN DED DPO MCHOG GI MGON GYIS BZUNG, ,LAS NYON 'JIGS RUNG SRID MTSO LAS GROL TE, ,KUN MKHYEN RGYAL BA'I GRONG DU MYUR 'JUG SHOG , ('DI NI RJE BTZUN CHEN PO'I BKA' LUNG SGRUB CHED DU T'A BLA MA TSE RING 'CHI MED SOGS LAS SNE BA RNAMS KYIS RGYU YON SBYOR TE LEGS PAR BSGRUBS PA'O, ,^KHU RE CHEN MO'I 'DUL KHRIMS GTZANG SRUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN GLIING GRVA TSANG GI SPAR KHANG DU BZHUGS, ,) SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
publisher_(хэвлэсэн_буюу_бүтээсэн_хийд_б: YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN GLING GRVA TSANG GI SPAR KHANG,
